title: Inversions Tableaux
abstract:
We introduce inversions tableaux, a new combinatorial model for Schubert
polynomials and Stanley-symmetric that directly specialize to semi-standard
Young tableaux in the Grassmannian case. They are a modification of the
balanced staircase tableaux of Edelman and Greene. We explicitly describe
inversions tableaux that correspond to the lexicographically minimal and
maximal monomials in each Schubert polynomial and characterize the unique
inversions tableau for dominant permutations. We also define tableaux skew
Schubert polynomials $\mathfrak{S}^t_{w/u}$ and prove certain properties about
them.
